metadata.title: CVE-2022-22620 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.2.1, iOS 15.3.1 and iPadOS 15.3.1,Safari 15.3 (v. 16612.4.9.1.8 and 15612.4.9.1.8). Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware ofa report that this issue may have been actively exploited..

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
